title: Should I pay a fine to AVOID voting? assimalhakeem JAL
transcript: Carlos from Brazil so today my country is that are Municipal elections so for those who don't vote so must be a fine La value in this case should I pay the fine or vote invalid or for any candidat if the candidates can be evaluated and you can tell which one is closer to Islam and the Muslims and would benefit Islam and the Muslims more than the other who is Extreme and hateful and islamophobe in this case without any hesitation vote for the other person because you are committing the lesser of the two evils we have two evils this one is lesser then you go ahead and do it and save your money and don't pay any fine
